attributes.action: Reform the organ donation process so that people need to take action to remove themselves from the list, apathy should not cause death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most people support organ donation and yet precious few act on this belief.  Many people who could live long lives die whilst waiting for an organ.  The current system is an aberration which forces relatives (in many cases) to consider the issue AFTER the death of a loved one.  Anybody who has strong views, religious or otherwise, can opt out without question. 
If you are religious surely Heaven knows  we need them here?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
